project_abstract.cdata: The Liaoning Urban Transport Project seeks to a) alleviate bottlenecks in the road system; b) increase efficiency and effectiveness of public transport services; c) improve maintenance of road investments; d) improve environmental sustainability of project investments; e) improve operational efficiency and safety of the road system; and f) strengthen local capacity for urban transport system management. The project will support the development of infrastructure, services, and institutions in the cities of Shenyang, Fushun, and Anshan. In Shenyang, the project will augment the existing urban road network through the construction of additional capacity in the principal east-west corridors, provide additional crossings of the railways lines, provide exclusive bus lanes, and strengthen local capacity for the management of urban transport operations and services through studies, technical assistance, and training. In Fushun, the project will finance the construction of the Hunhenan Corridor, the provision of bus priority facilities and non-motorized vehicle exclusive roads, and support studies, technical assistance, and training. In Anshan, the project will finance the reconstruction of the main north-south corridor and the construction of an interchange between the primary north-south and east-west corridors. The project will also support the development of selected sector institutions in the three cities.

P041890.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>辽宁城市交通项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目将改善沈阳、抚顺、鞍山三个城市的交通状况，并通过推广使用无铅汽油和催化剂转换器改善城市空气质量。该项目的实施将有助于减少客运和货运交通所用的时间，降低交通成本，提高城市交通系统的可靠性和安全性。该项目还将有助于提高交通管理部门制定政策、管理和实施的能力。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
